headline: Broadridge Declares Quarterly Dividend of $0.88 Per Share
summary: Broadridge Financial Solutions, Inc. (NYSE:BR) announced that its Board of Directors has declared a quarterly cash dividend of $0.88 per share. The dividend is payable on January 3, 2025 to stockholders of record at the close of business on December 13, 2024.
